attributes.title: Drop Your Obstacles for Sadashivoham 2016 - Soma Mandala
attributes.description:
Hold the Nectar of the Moon! Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals secrets about the next Spiritual Alchemy Product – the Chandra Mandala! He describes how Sadashiva’s right eye is the Surya Mandala, expressing all active tendencies such as logic, penetrating, scrutinizing, dissecting and ruling. Subramanya, Lord of the Siddhas, manifested through his Third Eye. But from Sadashiva’s left eye, all of the foundational, passive qualities like love, compassion, keeping things together, pro life, romance and breaking all obstacles manifest, including his son, beloved Ganesha! 

Soma Mandala is one of the most powerful Spiritual Alchemy Products yet. It will be used to awaken your Kundalini, making her stay awake and alive in your system!

Get a sneak peak of the making of Spiritual Alchemy Products:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qvj6gdYe-eY
